property.caption: Select Source
property.description: Select the entity to search/select from. This property defines the reference between the context object and the selectable object.

property.caption: Minimum Input Length
property.description: The minimum number of characters to be entered before the search executes

property.caption: Search type
property.description: What type of search is used.

property.caption: Search Delay
property.description: The delay, in milliseconds, before a search is executed.

property.caption: Search method
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Search attribute
property.description: Attribute to search on

property.caption: Data constraint
property.description: Optional constraint to filter the searchable objects

property.caption: Constrained by [Context]
property.description: Select the association from the context entity that the objects should be constrained by

property.caption: Constrained by [Source]
property.description: Select the association from the source entity that the objects should be constrained by

property.caption: Max Records
property.description: The maximum number of records to return (0 means no limit is applied)

property.caption: Search microflow
property.description: Run this microflow to execute the search

property.caption: Search String Attribute
property.description: Attribute to store the search term while searching via a microflow

property.caption: Search microflow
property.description: Run this microflow to execute the search

property.caption: Search method
property.description: Search method used for showing suggestions

property.caption: Search attribute
property.description: Attribute to search on

property.caption: Refresh cache via attribute
property.description: Optional, controls whether the cache is refreshed based on an attribute (true = refresh, false = don't refresh)

property.caption: Selected Template
property.description: Use ${VARIABLE_NAME} to have the attribute value inserted in this string. Note that this string (including replacements) is interpreted as Plain Text.

property.caption: Result Template
property.description: Use ${VARIABLE_NAME} to have the attribute value inserted in this string. Note that this string, except for the replacements, is interpreted as HTML.

property.caption: Variable name
property.description: Identifies the attribute value, this name should be used in 'Item Template' property.

property.caption: Attribute
property.description: Value of this attribute will be used to replace ${VARIABLE_NAME}, defined in 'Item Template' property

property.caption: Date format
property.description: Shows date and/or time according to locale of user.

property.caption: Date pattern
property.description: Optional, date pattern to override date part according to dojo/date/locale

property.caption: Time pattern
property.description: Optional, time pattern to override time part according to dojo/date/locale

property.caption: Decimal precision
property.description: Amount of decimals

property.caption: Group digits
property.description: Displays a numeric value with group digits

property.caption: Sort order
property.description: The sort order of the objects

property.caption: Attribute
property.description: An attribute to sort on

property.caption: Order
property.description: The order in which to sort

property.caption: Show Label
property.description: Show a label for the field.

property.caption: Label Caption
property.description: Specify the caption to use for the field

property.caption: Form orientation
property.description: The orientation of the form

property.caption: Label Width (weight)
property.description: The column size of the label control (only applied with horizontal orientation)

property.caption: Allow Clear
property.description: Allow user to clear selection.

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: If true, makes the control disabled.

property.caption: Disabled via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's control disabled property based on attribute (true = disabled, false = enabled)

property.caption: Visible
property.description: If true, makes the control visible.

property.caption: Visible via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's control visibility property based on attribute (true = visible, false = hidden)

property.caption: 'No results found' display type
property.description: The type of element to display if no results are found

property.caption: 'No results found' text
property.description: The string to display if no results are found. Displayed in a label or as a button caption depending on the value selected for "'No results found' display type"

property.caption: Search String Attribute
property.description: Attribute to store search string if no results are found

property.caption: No Results microflow
property.description: Microflow to run if "'No results found' display type" is Button, and the button is clicked

property.caption: Placeholder text
property.description: The value to display in the control when no item is selected

translations.translation: Select an item from the dropdown...
Select an item from the dropdown...

property.caption: 'Input too short' text
property.description: The string to display if the minimum input length has not been reached. Use tokens ${minLength} for minimum length setting and ${remainLength} for remaining characters required.

translations.translation: Please enter at least ${minLength} characters. (${remainLength} more to go!)
Please enter at least ${minLength} characters. (${remainLength} more to go!)

property.caption: 'Searching' text
property.description: The string to display while the search is executing.

property.caption: On change
property.description: Run this microflow when the dropdown changes
